name: Water Bike 3D Racing Stunts
description:
Ready to have fun with a crazy water bike racing simulator. Perfect riding and jumping bike on water surfer with endless sea and beach are all here to keep you busy with amazing water boat races with the latest bikes and scooters in water surfing games.

Experience the realistic drive of the fast Motor bikes and enjoy the high-speed surfing on the water. Bike surfing is easy to learn but very challenging to master. It will keep you in the game for hours. Speed and fast drive will increase your bike riding and motor surfer expertise. Learn how to surf fast on the water and take your skills to the professional level. Face the challenge and become the top bike rider.

How To Play:
- First of all, select your favorite rider and racing boat bike in the Water Surfer Motor Bike Racing adventure.
- Hold the acceleration button to speed up the bike and pass through all checkpoints to complete the mission in a given time.
- Tap the brake button to reduce the speed.
- Left arrow button and right arrow button are available to turn left or right
- Complete all the levels in a given time and perform water stunts.

Features:
- Splashing sounds & Effects for water motorbike racing games.
- Highly challenging & thrilling water bike racing simulator levels of water surfer.
- Smooth and easy controls for movements around the stunt racing zone.
- Free to play and excite your bike riding skills with crazy stunt.
- Attractive sea beach & motorcycle stunt driving animations.
- Smooth controls for movements around the water stunt racing zone.

Become a water surfer bike rider with floating motorbike racing stunts. Water racing simulator bike surfing gives you the best experience to have fun with different modes of motorbike racing for stunts floating bike racing. Play now the real Water Surfer Motor Bike Racing and Riding challenge and become an underwater surfer and beach racer.
